name: Innovate QA 2025
description: Join us at Innovate QA Conference 2025, a knowledge-rich event where industry leaders, pioneers, and visionaries share insights, best practices, and cutting-edge tools to build high-quality, safe, accessible, and reliable systems and products that customers love.

venue.name: Hilton Garden Inn
venue.directions: Off I-90, 15 miles from central Seattle, 20 miles from SeaTac airport - passing by Bellevue on the way. Free parking on premises.

sessions.title: Registration & Breakfast
sessions.description: Check-in, grab your badge, and network over breakfast

sessions.title: Opening Keynote: The Future of AI in Quality Engineering
sessions.description: Explore how AI is transforming the landscape of quality engineering and what it means for the future of testing.

sessions.title: Test Automation at Scale with Kubernetes
sessions.description: Learn strategies for scaling your test automation infrastructure using container orchestration.

sessions.title: Building High-Performing QA Teams
sessions.description: Discover the secrets to building and nurturing quality engineering teams that deliver excellence.

sessions.title: AI-Powered Visual Testing
sessions.description: Implement visual regression testing using machine learning for pixel-perfect applications.

sessions.title: Quality Metrics That Drive Business Value
sessions.description: Learn how to measure and communicate quality in terms that resonate with stakeholders.

sessions.title: Lunch & Networking
sessions.description: Enjoy lunch and connect with fellow attendees

sessions.title: Workshop: Building Your First AI Test Agent
sessions.description: Hands-on workshop to build an AI-powered testing agent from scratch.

sessions.title: Mobile Testing Deep Dive
sessions.description: Comprehensive strategies for testing mobile applications across platforms.

sessions.title: DevOps for QA: CI/CD Best Practices
sessions.description: Integrate testing seamlessly into your CI/CD pipeline for faster feedback.

sessions.title: Coffee Break
sessions.description: Refreshments and networking

sessions.title: Panel: The Future of Testing - AI, Automation & Beyond
sessions.description: Industry leaders discuss emerging trends and the future of quality engineering.

sessions.title: Evening Reception & Networking
sessions.description: Join us for drinks, appetizers, and networking with speakers and attendees.

sessions.title: Breakfast & Networking
sessions.description: Start day 2 with breakfast and conversations

sessions.title: Workshop: Performance Testing with K6
sessions.description: Learn modern performance testing techniques using K6 and cloud infrastructure.

sessions.title: Workshop: API Testing Strategies
sessions.description: Comprehensive API testing approaches for microservices architectures.

sessions.title: Accessibility Testing: Beyond Compliance
sessions.description: Create truly accessible applications that work for everyone.

sessions.title: Security Testing in the Age of AI
sessions.description: Modern security testing approaches for AI-powered applications.

sessions.title: Lunch
sessions.description: Lunch and informal discussions

sessions.title: Battle of AI Test Tools
sessions.description: Watch vendors compete head-to-head demonstrating their AI testing tools on the same challenge.

sessions.title: LLM Testing: Challenges and Solutions
sessions.description: How to test large language models and AI-powered features effectively.

sessions.title: Test Data Management at Scale
sessions.description: Strategies for managing test data in complex enterprise environments.

sessions.title: Closing Keynote: Quality as a Competitive Advantage
sessions.description: How quality engineering drives business success in today's competitive landscape.

sessions.title: Closing Remarks & Raffle
sessions.description: Thank you, prize drawings, and see you next year!

speakers.name: Sarah Chen
speakers.bio: Sarah is a seasoned engineering leader with 15+ years of experience building quality-focused engineering organizations. She's passionate about AI and its potential to transform testing.
talks: Opening Keynote: The Future of AI in Quality Engineering

speakers.name: Marcus Johnson
speakers.bio: Marcus leads a global QA team and specializes in scaling test automation infrastructure. He's a Kubernetes certified administrator and testing evangelist.
talks: Test Automation at Scale with Kubernetes

speakers.name: Elena Rodriguez
speakers.bio: Elena is a quality engineering leader focused on building high-performing teams. She writes extensively about QA leadership and has mentored dozens of engineers.
talks: Closing Keynote: Quality as a Competitive Advantage

speakers.name: David Kim
speakers.bio: David is a CTO and entrepreneur who has built multiple testing tools and platforms. He's a pioneer in AI-powered testing solutions.
talks: Workshop: Building Your First AI Test Agent

speakers.name: Priya Patel
speakers.bio: Priya leads quality engineering at a major fintech company, focusing on quality metrics and data-driven decision making.
talks: Quality Metrics That Drive Business Value

speakers.name: James Wilson
speakers.bio: James is a staff engineer specializing in mobile testing and performance engineering. He's contributed to several open-source testing tools.

speakers.name: Alex Thompson
speakers.bio: Alex is a DevOps expert who bridges the gap between development and QA teams. They specialize in CI/CD optimization and test infrastructure.
talks: DevOps for QA: CI/CD Best Practices

speakers.name: Lisa Martinez
speakers.bio: Lisa is an accessibility advocate and testing expert who helps companies build products that work for everyone.

speakers.name: Raj Kumar
speakers.bio: Raj is a security testing specialist with expertise in penetration testing and security automation for AI applications.
talks: Security Testing in the Age of AI

gold.name: Amazon Nova Foundation Models
gold.tagline: Frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance

silver.name: ACCELQ
silver.tagline: AI-Powered Codeless Test Automation on the Cloud

silver.name: Xray
silver.tagline: #1 Test Management App for QA in Jira

bronze.name: ContextQA
bronze.tagline: Agentic AI for Complete Test Coverage
